N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.4 - Policy

State Regulations

Defense emergency aid shall be administered in conformity
with the plans and regulations of the State Civil Defense Commission. During
the acute emergency period following attack, it is anticipated that due to
widespread destruction and disruption of the economy, defense emergency aid
will need to be administered in kind on a mass care basis. As soon as local
conditions permit, each local social services commissioner will begin to phase
out mass care an to furnish defense emergency aid in kind or as emergency
financial assistance by order, cash or check. An emergency financial assistance
program can be instituted when conditions permit: (a) the reestablishment of a viable money
economy; (b) an individual
application and interview process; and
(c) a sufficient number of local retail
establishments to be open and functioning. Notes
